Examples: Vulnerable: 'PHP Fatal error: /app/User.php:45'; Safe: 'Error occurred.' Java fix: logger.error(e);. Generate 25 high-quality flashcards following the EXACT flashcard_generation_schema. Ensure scaffolding progression (Layer 1 basics first, Layer 4 advanced). Integrate active learning (e.g., discussion-style questions). Distractors must be realistic (misconceptions, related CWE). Balance Bloom's levels per objectives. Output ONLY a JSON array: [{'id':1, 'bloom_level':'Remember', 'type':'Definition', 'front':'...', 'back':'...'}, ...]. No extra text.
